channel.title: Need help pleaseeeeee :)
channel.description: Basically i just need someone to help me fix my firemaking skill. I have it lighting logs (takes a bit longer then hopped), it moves to the west when done, and adds the desired exp lol. What i really need some help with is making it turn back towards the fire after it lights one and how to PREVENT THE NOCLIP BUG when lighting a fire with a wall to the west. If anyone could help me at all, it would be GREATLYYYY appreciated. :D Please and thank you. If you need a copy of my firemaking code I have no problem getting it. Thanks again in advance!!

item.title: Need help pleaseeeeee :)
